article.Heading: Union Budget 2017-18: Divestment policy of government remains same, says DIPAM Secy
article.Summary: The broad divestment policy remains the same and department is looking to achieve divestment target through minority stake sale, strategic sale, listing of CPSEs, consolidation of oil sector and listing of insurance companies.
article.Body:
Speaking to CNBC-TV18’s Sapna Das, Neeraj Kumar Gupta, secretary of department of investment and public asset management (DIPAM) said the broad divestment policy remains the same and department is looking to achieve divestment target through minority stake sale, strategic sale, listing of CPSEs, consolidation of oil sector and listing of insurance companies.

Watch video for more ...
